item.description:
Let's go to Block Island!

We'll meet at 8:30 AM at the ferry at Point Judith on SUNDAY, August 22nd. Our ferry is at 9:30 AM but it may be busy over the weekend so we want to get there early. We'll plan on biking around the island, then doing some swimming at the beach. The ferry costs 18.25 plus 6.10 for a bike for round trip. Ferries run from the Island back to Point Judith up until 8PM so we can stay up until then and of course people are welcome to join us for only part of the day. Lets hope for good weather!

Things you should bring:

  • A bike
  • A bike lock
  • Water
  • Sun glasses
  • Swim suit
  • Money for the ferry and incidentals
item.how_to_find_us: Try my cell or look for a guy on a red bike
item.name: Biking in Block Island!
